name: Earth Biggerer
description:
My entry to the GamePlusJam 2.

Your job is to mine other space objects and deploy their material on Earth, so that the earth population can grow freely. But keep in mind, don't destroy the Sun.

Unfortunately on my new build. Version 1.0.1 all planets ended up on the same space after playing for a few seconds. I have no idea what's causing it. The only think I can say is that in the editor it works just fine.
